      • addPointToPolygon

        public void addPointToPolygon(GPS target)
        Adds a point to the current list of points (currentPoly). When the checkbox for polygon-marking is deselected this list will be cleared and the polygon will be painted.
        Parameters:
        target - gps-point with coordinates

      • followBoat

        public void followBoat(GPS boatPosition)
        Creates a line with a node every (EVERY_X_GPS_POSITION + 1) positions/function calls representing the positions of the boat in the current mission. Should be reset with removeTrail() at the start of a new mission.
        Parameters:
        boatPosition - current Position of the boat
